strong.span: Congratulations to the Jay High School 2019-2020 Top Ten
Report on Community Survey for Bond Issue Needs

p.span: Please click HERE for the results.
Hard copies of the results are available at the superintendent’s office and each site office.
They are also available at the following local businesses...
Arvest Bank, Mease Medical Clinic, Grand Savings Bank, L&L Pawn, Delaware County Library, Lindly’s, and V&V Drug

strong.font: IT’S A GREAT YEAR TO BE A BULLDOG!

span.strong: Check your child’s state test scores here!

span.a: Oklahoma School Testing Program Parent Portal Overview.

span.em: Your child’s state ID can be found on their

span.a: Login to your OSTP Parent/Student Portal here.

span.strong: Jay Public Schools will once again provide free breakfast and lunch to all students this school year. Encourage your child to take part in this daily!

span.span: Athletic Season Passes Now On Sale!!
Season passes are now on sale and may be purchased at the administration building.
Thank you for supporting the Bulldogs!!!
